tags.name: Services
tags.description: Operations related to Services - applicative assets that can be either Single Page Applications (SPAs) or APIs. For detailed information about Services, visit [our documentation](https://docs.escape.tech/documentation#service).

tags.name: Schemas
tags.description: Endpoints for managing API Schemas (OpenAPI, GraphQL, etc.) that define the structure of your Services. Learn more in [our documentation](https://docs.escape.tech/documentation#schema).

tags.name: Applications
tags.description: Manage your DAST scanning configurations, including authentication details and environment settings. See [our documentation](https://docs.escape.tech/documentation#application) for more details.

tags.name: Locations
tags.description: Control your scanning environments, including both public and private locations. For more information about Locations, visit [our documentation](https://docs.escape.tech/documentation/enterprise/private-location/?h=private#overview).

tags.name: Scans
tags.description: Endpoints for triggering scans on your applications and retrieving details.

tags.name: Integrations
tags.description: Manage integrations with third-party services and tools to enhance your security workflow. For more information about Integrations, visit [our documentation](https://docs.escape.tech/documentation/inventory/integrations/).

info.title: Escape Public API
info.description:
This API enables you to operate [Escape](https://escape.tech/) programmatically.

All requests must be authenticated with a valid API key, provided in the `Authorization` header.
For example: `Authorization: Key YOUR_API_KEY`.

You can find your API key in the [Escape dashboard](http://app.escape.tech/user/).

apiKey.name: Authorization
apiKey.description: API key to authenticate requests: `Authorization: Key YOUR_API_KEY`
